game.name: Eyes On Me
game.categories: Single-player, Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Live a girls life while being stalked by a serial killer with an insteresting sexual fantasy. Can you reveal the story without completely shitting yourself?
